participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and a bit quirky, he enjoys trying to be unique in his hobbies.
participant_1.background: I play piano. I hope to become a music teacher after retirement. I am doing financial business now. I graduated high school in 1986.

participant_2.name: Mary
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, she loves nature and music.
participant_2.background: The weather here is very cold, but so beautiful in the spring. My favorite band is One Direction. I love to hike in the summer. I love to ski in the winter. My name is Mary and I am from Colorado.

content.text: Hello Mary, my name is John, where are you from?
Nice, I have always wanted to visit there. I have heard that the weather is very cold.
It can be very cold in the winter, but it is also very beautiful in the spring.
I love hiking and skiing, so I would love to visit in the spring.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I love to hike in the summer and ski in the winter.
It's funny, I like to ski in the summer and hike in the winter.
You are a bit odd, but I like that.
Thank you, I like to be different.
So, what do you do for fun?
I love to listen to music, go to concerts, and watch movies.
Those are some of my favorite things to do too.
Great. I will text you my number.
